original_text:
Maximator
Molti appassionati di gioco online sono affezionati alle vecchie slot terrestri, le uniche disponibili quando internet ancora non esisteva e per giocare era necessario recarsi in un casinò fisico o in una sala giochi.
È proprio ai giocatori nostalgici che sembra rivolgersi la Swintt, anche se siamo sicuri che provando Maximator, anche chi è abituato a slot più moderne non riuscirà a smettere di giocarci.
Con uno stile essenziale, colori accesi e simboli di grandi dimensioni dall’ottima definizione, ci troviamo di fronte a un prodotto che vi scalderà il cuore, anche grazie ai suoni che riprendono quelli delle slot terrestri, per un’esperienza ludica dal sapore vintage!
Tutto l’essenziale racchiuso in una piccola griglia
La griglia di gioco è molto basilare, con tre rulli e tre righe e appena 5 linee di pagamento fisse su cui è possibile puntare 5 crediti totali, con il costo di ogni credito fissato a 0,01 €. Per vincere è necessario formare combo di simboli identici adiacenti a partire dal rullo di sinistra e procedendo verso destra. L’Autoplay permette di impostare un numero variabile di giri automatici, compresi alcuni limiti di spesa, di vincita o di perdita oltre i quali questa modalità di gioco verrà interrotta.
La volatilità è alta, mentre il ritorno teorico al giocatore è nella norma, essendo pari al 95,01%.
Simboli, Respins e mega vincita
Vediamo ora i simboli di Maximator partendo da quello più bassi. A pagare meno di tutti è la x, seguita dalle ciliegie e dal limone, poi c’è l’arancio, le prugne, la scritta bar, la campana e il numero sette.
La volpe è il nostro Wild, e oltre a sostituire tutti i simboli, è pagante.
In Maximator sono presenti un po’ di funzioni speciali. Innanzitutto, la funzione Respins: quando su due rulli atterrano simboli identici impilati, che però non generano una vincita, allora il terzo rullo girerà indipendentemente con un Respin, dando la possibilità di ottener una o più vincite.
Un’altra funzione speciale si attiva quando su tutti i rulli atterra un unico simbolo a ricoprire l’intera griglia. In tal caso, sullo schermo apparirà una grande ruota della fortuna divisa in spicchino all’interno un moltiplicatore da applicare alla vincita. Differisce solo uno spicchio, destinato invece al Premio Maxi.
In Maximator è presente la funzione Gamble. In pratica, dopo ogni vincita, si può decidere di provare a raddoppiare la vincita. Cliccando sul tasto Risk, ci verrà mostrato un mazzo da carte coperto e noi dovremo tentare di indovinare il colore della carta estratta. Se la scelta si rivela corretta, avremo un altra possibilità di incrementare la vincita, in caso di errore perderemo tutto.

FAQ: Le risposte alle domande più frequenti 
Ho letto che nel gioco è presente la funzione Gamble. È consigliabile usufruirne?

Dipende da quanto si è temerari! La funzione Gamble offre il 50% di possibilità di indovinare e quindi raddoppiare la vincita ma, d’altra parte, in caso di sconfitta si perde l’intera somma!



Dove posso giocare a Maximator?

In tutti i casinò online certificati AAMS, a garanzia della legalità del casinò.



Posso provare il gioco prima di investire soldi?

Certo, in tutte le piattaforme dedicate alle slot è possibile testare il gioco attraverso la versione DEMO o Play for Fun.

raw_translation.response:
Maximator Review

Many online gaming enthusiasts are attached to the old land-based slot machines, the only ones available when the internet did not yet exist and it was necessary to go to a physical casino or arcade to play. Swintt seems to appeal to nostalgic players, although we are sure that trying Maximator, even those accustomed to more modern slots will not be able to stop playing it.

With an essential style, vibrant colors, and large symbols with excellent definition, we are faced with a product that will warm your heart, also thanks to the sounds that replicate those of land-based slots, for a vintage gaming experience! 

All essential features in a small grid

The game grid is very basic, with three reels and three rows and just 5 fixed pay lines on which you can bet 5 total credits, with the cost of each credit set at €0.01. To win, it is necessary to form combos of adjacent identical symbols starting from the left reel and proceeding to the right. Autoplay allows you to set a variable number of automatic spins, including some limits on spending, winning, or losing, beyond which this game mode will be interrupted.

The volatility is high, while the theoretical return to the player is normal, being equal to 95.01%.

Symbols, respins, and mega win

Now let's look at the symbols of Maximator starting from the lowest. Paying the least of all is the x, followed by the cherries and the lemon, then there is the orange, the plums, the bar sign, the bell, and the number seven. The fox is our Wild and, in addition to replacing all symbols, it pays.

Maximator has some special features. First of all, the Respins function: when two identical stacked symbols land on two reels, but do not generate a win, then the third reel will spin independently with a Respin, giving the possibility of obtaining one or more wins.

Another special function is activated when a single symbol lands on all the reels to cover the entire grid. In this case, a large wheel of fortune divided into segments with a multiplier to apply to the win will appear on the screen. Only one segment differs, destined for the Maxi Prize instead.

Maximator has a Gamble function. In practice, after every win, you can decide to try to double the win. By clicking on the Risk button, a deck of covered cards will be shown, and you will have to try to guess the color of the drawn card. If the choice turns out to be correct, we will have another chance to increase the win, in case of error, we will lose everything.

FAQ: Answers to the most frequently asked questions

I read that the Gamble function is in the game. Is it advisable to take advantage of it?

It depends on how daring you are! The Gamble function offers a 50% chance of guessing and therefore doubling the win; on the other hand, in case of defeat, the entire sum is lost!

Where can I play Maximator?

In all AAMS certified online casinos, guaranteeing the legality of the casino.

Can I try the game before investing real money?

Certainly, in all platforms dedicated to slots, it is possible to test the game through the DEMO or Play for Fun version.

Maximator

Many online gaming enthusiasts are attached to old-fashioned land-based slot machines, the only ones available before the internet existed and you had to go to a physical casino or gaming hall to play. Swintt seems to address nostalgic players, although we are sure that even those who are used to more modern slots will not be able to stop playing Maximator.

The fox is our Wild, and in addition to replacing all symbols, it also pays out.

Another special feature is activated when a single symbol lands on all reels to cover the entire grid. In this case, a large fortune wheel divided into segments with a multiplier to apply to the win will appear on the screen. It only differs by one segment, which is intended for the Maxi Prize.

raw_translation_without_faq.response: Maximator is an online slot game that appeals to nostalgic players who enjoy old land-based slot machines. The game has a simple grid with three reels and five fixed pay lines. The Wild symbol is the fox, which can replace all other symbols to pay. The game has a Respin function that is activated when two identical stacked symbols land on two reels without generating a win. The third reel will spin independently with a Respin to try and obtain one or more wins. When a single symbol lands on all the reels to cover the entire grid, a large wheel of fortune will appear on the screen with a multiplier to apply to the win. Maximator also has a Gamble function that allows players to double their win by guessing the color of the drawn card. The game has a high volatility and a theoretical return to the player of 95.01%. Maximator can be played in all AAMS certified online casinos, and a demo or play for fun version is available to test the game before investing real money.

The Wild symbol is the fox, which can replace all other symbols to pay. The game has a Respin function that is activated when two identical stacked symbols land on two reels without generating a win. The third reel will spin independently with a Respin to try and obtain one or more wins. When a single symbol lands on all the reels to cover the entire grid, a large wheel of fortune will appear on the screen with a multiplier to apply to the win. Maximator also has a Gamble function that allows players to double their win by guessing the color of the drawn card. The game has a high volatility and a theoretical return to the player of 95.01%. Maximator can be played in all AAMS certified online casinos, and a demo or play for fun version is available to test the game before investing real money.

review_with_topics.prompt:
Below is a review for the slot game "Maximator".

Please, rewrite the review in a neutral tone of voice. Write subsections covering only the following topics:

Gameplay features including reels, paylines, and symbols
Respin function and its conditions
Multiplier wheel feature
Gamble function
Game's volatility and theoretical return to player

- The review must be very detailed
- No FAQ
- No Notes
- Respond with a JSON array, one item per topic (use the keys "headline" and "content")

Review: Maximator Review

Many online gaming enthusiasts are attached to the old land-based slot machines, the only ones available when the internet did not yet exist and it was necessary to go to a physical casino or arcade to play. Swintt seems to appeal to nostalgic players, although we are sure that trying Maximator, even those accustomed to more modern slots will not be able to stop playing it.

With an essential style, vibrant colors, and large symbols with excellent definition, we are faced with a product that will warm your heart, also thanks to the sounds that replicate those of land-based slots, for a vintage gaming experience! 

All essential features in a small grid

The game grid is very basic, with three reels and three rows and just 5 fixed pay lines on which you can bet 5 total credits, with the cost of each credit set at €0.01. To win, it is necessary to form combos of adjacent identical symbols starting from the left reel and proceeding to the right. Autoplay allows you to set a variable number of automatic spins, including some limits on spending, winning, or losing, beyond which this game mode will be interrupted.

The volatility is high, while the theoretical return to the player is normal, being equal to 95.01%.

Symbols, respins, and mega win

Now let's look at the symbols of Maximator starting from the lowest. Paying the least of all is the x, followed by the cherries and the lemon, then there is the orange, the plums, the bar sign, the bell, and the number seven. The fox is our Wild and, in addition to replacing all symbols, it pays.

Maximator has some special features. First of all, the Respins function: when two identical stacked symbols land on two reels, but do not generate a win, then the third reel will spin independently with a Respin, giving the possibility of obtaining one or more wins.

Another special function is activated when a single symbol lands on all the reels to cover the entire grid. In this case, a large wheel of fortune divided into segments with a multiplier to apply to the win will appear on the screen. Only one segment differs, destined for the Maxi Prize instead.

Maximator has a Gamble function. In practice, after every win, you can decide to try to double the win. By clicking on the Risk button, a deck of covered cards will be shown, and you will have to try to guess the color of the drawn card. If the choice turns out to be correct, we will have another chance to increase the win, in case of error, we will lose everything.

FAQ: Answers to the most frequently asked questions

I read that the Gamble function is in the game. Is it advisable to take advantage of it?

It depends on how daring you are! The Gamble function offers a 50% chance of guessing and therefore doubling the win; on the other hand, in case of defeat, the entire sum is lost!

Where can I play Maximator?

In all AAMS certified online casinos, guaranteeing the legality of the casino.

Can I try the game before investing real money?

Certainly, in all platforms dedicated to slots, it is possible to test the game through the DEMO or Play for Fun version.

meta.prompt:
Below is a review of the game "Maximator".

Please provide the following:

- Bullet lists briefly covering the topic "What we like". (4 bullet points)
- Bullet lists briefly covering the topic "What we don't like". (2 bullet pints)
- SEO optimized meta title with a maximum length of 45 characters. Include the words "play" and "free". Capitalize according to AP rules.
- SEO optimized, neutral meta description, explaining the review with a maximum length of 20 words. Include the words "play" and "free".

Respond with a JSON using the keys "pros" (simple array), "cons" (simple array), "meta_title" and "meta_description". 

Review:
 
Maximator Overview

Maximator is an online slot game that aims to appeal to nostalgic players who prefer the old land-based slot machines. Developed by Swintt, this game has a vintage vibe with vibrant colors and classic sound effects that replicate those of land-based slots. The game grid is basic, with three reels and three rows, and just 5 fixed pay lines on which you can bet 5 total credits. Its features include Respins, a multiplier wheel, and a Gamble function.

Gameplay and Features

To win in Maximator, players must form combos of adjacent identical symbols starting from the left reel and proceeding to the right. Autoplay allows players to set a variable number of automatic spins, including some limits on spending, winning, or losing. The game also has a high volatility and a 95.01% theoretical return to the player. Its features include the Respins function, which occurs when two identical stacked symbols land on two reels but do not generate a win, and a Gamble function that offers players a 50% chance of guessing and doubling their win.

Symbols and Paylines

Maximator has several symbols that have different pay values. The x, cherries, and lemon are the low-value symbols. The orange, plums, bar sign, bell, and number seven have higher pay values. The fox is the Wild symbol and can replace all symbols and pays. There are just 5 fixed pay lines on this game, on which players can bet 5 total credits, with the cost of each credit set at €0.01. The paylines pay from left to right.

Volatility and RTP

Maximator has a high volatility and a 95.01% theoretical return to the player. Volatility refers to the risk involved in playing the game. Games with high volatility have a higher risk but also offer greater rewards. The theoretical return to the player is the ratio of how much money the game will pay out in winnings compared to the amount bet.

Where to Play and Try Maximator

Maximator is available in all AAMS certified online casinos, ensuring the legality of the casino. Players can also try the game without investing real money through the DEMO or Play for Fun version available on all platforms dedicated to slot games.

faq.role: You are an experienced writer in the field of online slot games.
faq.prompt:
Below is a review of the game "Maximator".

Please provide an FAQ:

- 8 questions
- Use simple language and provide practical takeaways.
- Respond with a JSON!
- Use the key "faq" and an array with the keys "question" and "answer". 

Review: Maximator Review

Many online gaming enthusiasts are attached to the old land-based slot machines, the only ones available when the internet did not yet exist and it was necessary to go to a physical casino or arcade to play. Swintt seems to appeal to nostalgic players, although we are sure that trying Maximator, even those accustomed to more modern slots will not be able to stop playing it.

With an essential style, vibrant colors, and large symbols with excellent definition, we are faced with a product that will warm your heart, also thanks to the sounds that replicate those of land-based slots, for a vintage gaming experience! 

All essential features in a small grid

The game grid is very basic, with three reels and three rows and just 5 fixed pay lines on which you can bet 5 total credits, with the cost of each credit set at €0.01. To win, it is necessary to form combos of adjacent identical symbols starting from the left reel and proceeding to the right. Autoplay allows you to set a variable number of automatic spins, including some limits on spending, winning, or losing, beyond which this game mode will be interrupted.

The volatility is high, while the theoretical return to the player is normal, being equal to 95.01%.

Symbols, respins, and mega win

Now let's look at the symbols of Maximator starting from the lowest. Paying the least of all is the x, followed by the cherries and the lemon, then there is the orange, the plums, the bar sign, the bell, and the number seven. The fox is our Wild and, in addition to replacing all symbols, it pays.

Maximator has some special features. First of all, the Respins function: when two identical stacked symbols land on two reels, but do not generate a win, then the third reel will spin independently with a Respin, giving the possibility of obtaining one or more wins.

Another special function is activated when a single symbol lands on all the reels to cover the entire grid. In this case, a large wheel of fortune divided into segments with a multiplier to apply to the win will appear on the screen. Only one segment differs, destined for the Maxi Prize instead.

Maximator has a Gamble function. In practice, after every win, you can decide to try to double the win. By clicking on the Risk button, a deck of covered cards will be shown, and you will have to try to guess the color of the drawn card. If the choice turns out to be correct, we will have another chance to increase the win, in case of error, we will lose everything.

FAQ: Answers to the most frequently asked questions

I read that the Gamble function is in the game. Is it advisable to take advantage of it?

It depends on how daring you are! The Gamble function offers a 50% chance of guessing and therefore doubling the win; on the other hand, in case of defeat, the entire sum is lost!

Where can I play Maximator?

In all AAMS certified online casinos, guaranteeing the legality of the casino.

Can I try the game before investing real money?

Certainly, in all platforms dedicated to slots, it is possible to test the game through the DEMO or Play for Fun version.
